DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Adults 18 year great 2 . Healthy Exclusion criterion : 1 . PVC < 30 2 . Hypertensive subject ACE inhibitor 3 . Pregnant nursing mother 4 . Diabetic HbA1C > 7.5 stigma end organ damage ( neuropathy , retinopathy , nephropathy , cardiomyopathy ) 5 . Cholesterol > 30 mg/dL NCEP accept level base cardiac risk . 6 . Triglycerides > 200 7 . Previously diagnose obstructive coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction leave ventricular dysfunction ( without history congestive heart failure ) 8 . Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine ≥ 1.5 mg/dl ) 9 . History cerebrovascular disease 10 . Any chronic inflammatory disease ( rheumatologic , inflammatory bowel disease , etc ) 11 . Uncontrolled Stage 2 Hypertension ( 160/100 mmHg ) , end organ damage due hypertension ( left ventricular hypertrophy , atrial fibrillation , hematuria , renal insufficiency , prior cerebrovascular disease ) . 12 . Angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor use 13 . Coagulopathy ( INR ≥ 1.5 , PTT ≥ 1.5 x control ) 14 . Other chronic medical illness discretion investigator
